title: Apple needs to be careful…
description:
There’s a lot of hullabaloo concerning the new iPad—that it’s designed by compromise. I believe the exact opposite—that its unwillingness to exclude features makes it quite good. But designing by balance sheet comes at a cost and the iPad Pro is proof of that. 

10th gen iPad - https://amzn.to/3UJqXrs
